dct_description_sm: "Basic map revised by the Trigonmetrical Survey Office 1947. Overprints drawn by the Trigonometrical Survey Office 1951."
Includes inset of Pretoria and Witwatersrand.
dct_creator_sm: South Africa, Department of Agriculture, Division of Botany and Plant Pathology
dct_publisher_sm: Afdeling Plant- en Plantsiektekunde, Departement van Landbou, Unie van Suid-Afrika
